title: Deaths in Boat Disaster in English Channel Were Avoidable, Inquiry Finds
summary_full: The report blamed people smugglers and “systemic failure” on the part of the authorities after about 30 people drowned as they tried to reach Britain from France in 2021.
summary_public: The report blamed people smugglers and “systemic failure” on the part of the authorities after about 30 people drowned as they tried to reach Britain from France in 2021.

FR.evidence: Deaths in Boat Disaster in English Channel Were Avoidable
